unnormalised: Campus hiring remains crucial for talent acquisition. Birla Institute of Technology & Science (BITS), Pilani consistently delivers exceptional candidates. We at ABC Corp value this pipeline. Our recruiters will be at IIT Delhi next month. Early investments in fresh talent, like that shown in "3 Idiots", guarantee long-term ROI. Packages starting at Rs. 7 LPA offered. We encourage all eligible students to apply.
